name: Maze Cube
description:
Remember those plastic cubes with mazes we used to have when we were kids? Now you can play a more exciting virtual version! 

Reach the Sun Stone in easy mode / Moon Stone in hard mode before you run out of time. Warp portals will help you get closer to the goal... or maybe not! 

------

CONTROLS:

  • Cube moves by mouse-dragging. Hold left-click and move the mouse. Release the button to stop movement.
  • "ESC" key triggers Pause menu.

------

Hi everyone! This is my first approach to video game developing. The game was entirely made with Unity Engine in less than 2 months. All assets used are from Unity Asset Store.  

Of course, any suggestion is welcome as well as opinions or donations.  If reviews are good enough, I'll consider making a Story Mode with different levels, score points and maybe some extra items.

Hope you enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed coding it :3
